Description: For sale is a very rare left handed 2002 Rickenbacker 360/12 in a beautiful Fireglo with the original case. This guitar is in excellent condition and in perfect working order. There are some light scratches and a couple very tiny dings. Overall, I would give it a solid 9.5 out of 10 condition. Everything on the guitar is original. There are no cracks, repairs, or major issues. The neck is straight with no issues. The original frets are in excellent condition with no wear. There is no buzzing or dead spots. The original case works great. SPECS: Nut Width: 1.66" 1st Fret: 0.95" 12th Fret: 0.95" Neck Type: Medium Finger Board: Rosewood Pickups: Original Weight: 7lb 14oz If you scroll all the way down to the bottom of the pictures you can see detailed pictures of the frets, any wear on the guitar, and the guitar taken apart.
